name: social-sports-betting-platform
description: A social platform for managing, tracking, and discussing sports betting activities without handling real bets

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
